title: Facebook’s new search will scour all public posts
text:
Facebook’s new search will scour all public posts 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
Facebook's expanding the scope of its search function to encompass all 2 trillion (and counting) public posts on the social network. It's an...
